Package com.linkedpipes.lpa.backend.util

Class HttpRequestSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linkedpipes.lpa.backend.util.HttpRequestSender
  • public class HttpRequestSender
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder for HTTP requests. Some settings of the builder are mandatory. If any mandatory setting is not provided, the send() method throws IllegalStateException. Example use case: 
     String responseBody = new HttpRequestSender()
         .to("http://www.example.com/")
         .method(GET)
         .requestBody("A payload to send to the website.")
         .contentType("text/plain")
         .send();

      • to

        public HttpRequestSender to​(java.lang.String urlString)
        Sets the target URL to connect to. This setting is mandatory.
        Parameters:
        urlString - the target URL
        Returns:
        this

      • method

        public HttpRequestSender method​(HttpRequestSender.HttpMethod method)
        Sets the HTTP method to use for this request. This setting is optional. The default is HttpRequestSender.HttpMethod.GET.
        Parameters:
        method - the desired HTTP method
        Returns:
        this

      • parameter

        public HttpRequestSender parameter​(java.lang.String key,
                                   java.lang.String value)
        Adds a key-value pair to the list of the GET parameters for this request. If the key has already been mapped to a value before, the previous value is overridden. The list of parameters is appended to the target URL regardless of the request method.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to map to a value
        value - the mapped value
        Returns:
        this

      • send

        public java.lang.String send()
                      throws LpAppsException
        Generates and sends the HTTP request, obtaining a connection from the dependency-injected factory.
        Returns:
        the body of the response obtained by the request
        Throws:
        LpAppsException - if an I/O error occurs
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a mandatory setting has not been set for this builder
